message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. I am willing to pay $130 for it.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $140.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I'm glad we're getting closer. I would like to propose a price of $135 for the product.
I'm still a bit above my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further and sell the product to you for $137.50.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with a price of $132.5 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $134. I think this is a fair price for both of us.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I believe we're making progress. I would like to propose a price of $133 for the product.
I'm really close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $132. I think this is the best we can do.
